instructions.save-files: Press [1], [2], or [3] to navigate save files.
instructions.save-slot: Press [S] to save your game into that slot.
instructions.load-slot: Press [L] to load your game from that slot.
instructions.undo-redo: Press [U] to Undo and [R] to Redo.
instructions.movement: Use Arrow Keys to move player on grid. Every player step passes time.
instructions.reap: Press [SPACEBAR] to sow or reap plants in each cell.
